attributes.action: British government to place bans and sanctions on Israel
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, plead that the British government place bans and sanctions on the Israeli government for the unlawful actions they are committing in Gaza.

Israel is openly ignoring the Geneva convention and going against UN regulations by bombing schools, hospitals and foreign media centres.

This is not about race, religion, colour or creed. This is about the pointless slaughter of innocent men, women and children. This is about humanity uniting against this senseless genocide. Let us unite together and stop this atrocity.

#Peace4Palestine
